trans-unit.source: Defines an interface for common formatting-option properties to be applied to field template user controls.
trans-unit.target: 定義通用的格式化選項屬性套用至欄位樣板使用者控制項的介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the formatting string that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.DataFormatString*> property is applied to field values when the field is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否的格式字串所指定<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.DataFormatString*>欄位處於編輯模式時，屬性會套用到欄位的值。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.DataFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the formatting string is applied in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果格式字串套用至，編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> values when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否將空字串值 ("") 自動轉換為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>值的資料來源中更新資料欄位時。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if empty string values are automatically converted to null values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果空字串值會自動轉換成 null 值;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的欄位值的顯示格式的字串。

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 指定的欄位值的顯示格式的格式化字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the data for the control is HTML-encoded before it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項的資料是否經過 HTML 編碼轉譯之前。

trans-unit.source: HTML-encoding field values helps prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being rendered to the browser.
trans-unit.target: HTML 編碼的欄位值有助於防止跨網站指令碼的攻擊和瀏覽器中呈現的惡意內容。

trans-unit.source: This property should be enabled unless you trust the content or have checked for malicious content in another way.
trans-unit.target: 應該啟用這個屬性，除非您信任的內容或簽入另一種方式惡意內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data for the control is HTML-encoded before it is rendered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項的資料是 HTML 編碼呈現; 之前否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption that is displayed for a field when the field value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得欄位值時所顯示的標題欄位<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The caption that is displayed for a field when the field value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 欄位值時，會將欄位顯示的標題<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
